text: Richard is trying to get the exhibit to the Congo
column4: but technology
column6: finances and other concerns are proving difficult to overcome.

text: My work is moving toward somewhere between video and photography...Richard Mosse #mosse
When a white man come bounding into a refugee camp, they notice... I try to be aware Richard Mosse #mosse
When your boss has been indicted for war crimes... there is a certain way you look down the barrel of the lens Richard Mosse #mosse
We're taking questions for Richard Mosse from the audience and from those of you at home. Tweet at us! #mosse
The soundtrack to his immersive exhibition The Enclave was created by sound artist Ben Frost (@ethermachines) #mosse
#mosse was documenting guerrillas with the film originally used to destroy them.
The term 'psychedelic' is derived from the Ancient Greek words psychƒì (mind) and dƒìloun (to reveal). #mosse
Infrared film was often used by artists like Bob Dylan and Jimi Hendrix to highlight the psychedelic nature of their personas #mosse
Infrared film was used by the military to separate man-made camouflage from verdant foliage.
#Mosse believes that the bold pink hues of his photography may have helped make his images accessible + interesting to a larger audience.
Originally Richard Mosse was commissioned by Human Rights Watch (@hrw) to document the situation in the Congo. #mosse
Richard speaks of Werner Herzog's 'ecstatic truth' and his manipulation of documentary 'truth'. #mosse
